casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth BROWN, Jr. No. 413P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 9, 2005. Sofie Hosford, Wilmington, for Kenneth Brown, Jr. Ben David, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed pending determination of the State's Petition for Discretionary Review by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of August 2005."
